review.title: “It was a learning experience for me.”
review.pros: Pros – They offer flexible hours and the staff is very nice.
review.cons: Cons – The managers call you a lot on your days off and sometimes show attitude if you cant make it in on that day.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I would just ask to try to be a little more understanding.

review.title: “Horrible place to ever work in!”
review.pros: Pros – Free food lol and discounts on the downlow of course.
review.cons: Cons – There is no potential career growth in here. The most you can become is bookkeeper which just does not motivate someone to work harder. The manager is a complete a hole who expects you to flirt with him and kiss up to him. God forbid you ever get on his bad side!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Quit being so full of yourself! and listen to your employees once in a while on how the place can be improved.
